name: Memory Game
description: You must have a good memory to win this 'The Office' themed Memory Game! This app demonstrates basic logic and state management using React.

name: OpenSky LAANC
description: This platform, built for Aeronyde Corporation, allows commercial drone/UAV users to safely integrate into airspace, and is approved by the FAA. My role: Front End Developer

name: HOSI Mobile App
description: I rebuilt and redesigned the Hospice of Southern Illinois mobile application using React Native with Expo. The app is currently deployed on Google Play and the Apple App Store.
